channel.title: Forget.. it .. --- close the thread
channel.description: if any mod could close this?? -- i found the solution of my problem

item.title: Forget.. it .. --- close the thread
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:6, topic:402569”][quote author=DevilsCape link=topic=499626.msg3653941#msg3653941 date=1309903607]
thx all ^^

but i found the solution of my problem

thx all ;D

this was fast help …!

thx much!
[/quote]

The only thing you really NEED is forinthry bracelets. They make revs do 0 damage to you for 1 minuet, and non aggresive for 1 hour.[/quote]Won’t help against pkers though… If you really go with only forinthry braces, you will lose money faster than you will gain it. I only ever brought one with 1 charge left per trip with black dhide top and chaps with a dragon defender and a whip. I’d save all of them with protect item, i’d only lose the forinthry brace and whatever food i brought, and that forinthry brace lasts for 1 hour, even after dying/leaving. I also used the canoes to get there, so I’d only lose that 1 forinthry per 2-6 trips, 15 monkfish per trip, a steel hatchet and a super set, Overall trip cost = 10k. If you go in with even 10 forinthry braces, I think you’ll lose 50k if you die?

Yeah, not worth it.

Read full topic

item.title: Forget.. it .. --- close the thread
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Wear black d’hide, skillcape/firecape, whip, dragon defender, zerker or other helm, barrows gloves, dragon boots, and such. Bring a tele tab, super set, prayer potions and food. And ofcourse, your brace.

Read full topic

item.title: Forget.. it .. --- close the thread
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Yes you can go alone. Use turmoil or piety the whole time. Bring 10 pray pots. 2 shark or rocktails, and the rest forinthry bracelet(5)'s. Wear the best d’hide you can and use a whip or rapier or something. Don’t bring anything you’re afraid to lose as you’ll probably get attacked by a team in less than 10 minuets. Make sure you bring a glory,(Or any other type of jewlery that can tele you), to tele because unlike any other tele’s, you can tele beyond 20 in the wild. (Can go up to 29 and tele.) I hope this helped.

Read full topic
